author: jvanzyl
msg: I was a little premature in the location of the update functionality.
We will not only want to update the project descriptor but we might need
to update properties files, make additions to the directory structure and
who knows what else ... so we need to account for anything so we can
use dvsl to update the descriptor and have an ant build file do anything
else that we need to bring the entire structure of a project forward
